Edwin Mahinda, bụ onye Kenya lara ezumike nká. Malite ọrụ sinima ya dịka nwata na-ese ihe, a maara Mahinda nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri The Kitchen Toto, White Mischief na The Lion of Africa

N'afọ 1987, Mahinda pụtara na sinima mbụ ya na ihe nkiri British The Kitchen Toto Ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Mwangi' na ihe nkiri ahụ, ebe o mechara merie Paris Film Festival Award for Best Actor Site na ihe ịga nke ọma nke ihe nkiri ahụ, a họpụtara ya maka ihe nkiri 1987 White Mischief maka obere ọrụ nke 'Boy Waiter at Wake'
Otú ọ dị, n'afọ 1988, ọ rụrụ ọrụ nkwado ọzọ 'Joko's Brother' na ihe nkiri American adventure The Lion of Africa
Ihe nkiri a malitere n'ọnwa June 28, afọ 1987, na HBO.
N'afọ 1989, Mahinda mere ihe nkiri ikpeazụ ya
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Moja' na Piramiddo no kanata ni: White Lion densetsu
